resources.string: Hello. Welcome to RoWrite\nStart Creating Now!
The Page will be permanently deleted
To group multiple Pages press \n two pages to select and then Pinch
Page creation failed. Please try again.
Long press to select multiple Pages
All Pages in group will be permanently deleted
Tapping again will quit the app
Cannot replay, no content on Page
Double tap to \n erase all Page content
Please pause video and then press Split icon
Pause video where you want to Split Page
Your device type does not support playback
Failed to save video. Not enough storage.
Your device type does not support exporting video
Convert to Text \n changes handwriting \n to typed text
As you write on paper your words are converted to typed text
Select your writing language in Settings>RoWrite App to increase conversion accuracy.
Unable to convert to typed text, Wi-Fi activation required. Go to your device Settings and connect to a Wi-Fi network.to convert to text.
Cannot create new Page while in conversion mode. Please quit convert to text and try again.
Conversion in process, please try later.
For best results, please write clearly and horizontally
To use Convert to Text \n pair a device to RoWrite
Redo conversion? Prior changes to converted text will be lost.
Changing Convert to Text language may cause some letters or numbers on Page to change.
Something wrong with the network. Please try again.
Enable camera access in settings to use feature
Enable storage and camera access in settings to use feature
Enable storage access in settings to use feature
RoWrite needs access to your camera to scan or create a custom background.
RoWrite needs access to your Album to save Pages or create a custom background.
Please turn on Bluetooth in settings to connect your RoWrtie.
Unlock Convert to Text feature with RoWrite purchase
To improve RoWrite, please provide feedback
Please enter no more than 1000 characters
This will delete all Pages stored on RoWrite.
Updating firmware now…\n Please keep device connected.
Firmware is up to date V1.3
Firmware is up to date v%s
Wi-Fi network is unavailable. Download the latest version using cellular data?
Unable to retrieve firmware version information
Firmware update in progress. Please wait...
Firmware update failed. Please reset device.
Creating a name makes it easier to identify and pair your RoWrite
Hi. Do you have a RoWrite device?
This will delete all Pages stored on RoWrite, Okay to delete?
Scan bar code on the back of RoWrite to Pair.
Failed to connect. Please try again.
When creating a name for RoWrite choose one that is easily remembered
RoWrite is no longer associated with an account. All data saved in Rowrite\'s internal memory can be accessed by anyone.
RoWrite is associated to an account and in Private Mode. To remove this account the account owner\'s mobile device must be connected.
Please ensure your device power is on.
©2018 Royole Corporation. The Royole logo, Royole, and RoWrite are registered trademarks of Royole Corporation. All rights reserved.

of Royole Corporation. All rights reserved.

Wi-Fi not connected, use cellular data?
Your App is up to date V1.6

Anyone can connect to this RoWrite
Owner\'s mobile device or a password is needed to connect to this RoWrite
Enter the 6-digit connection password to connect to this RoWrite
To reset RoWrite, find a needle or other smaller item and insert it into the reset hole near the power button on Rowrite
Note, if you reset RoWrite all contents stored on RoWrite\'s internal memory will be deleted. Before resetting please transfer all data from RoWrite to the RoWrite app.
